nodes.text: Secrets of the Jedi was an exhibit displayed in the Starlight Pavilion for the Valo Republic Fair around 231 BBY. Curated by Jedi archivist OrbaLin, the exhibit included the Cassadrean Matrix, Tythonian Mastery Tokens, a phrik staff from the Blood Moon Uprising, an ancient deep-space transmitter recovered from Vrogas Vas, and the Lariat of Armistice. When the Nihil later attacked Valo, OrbaLin fought Tempest Runner Lourna Dee and some of her pirates amidst the exhibit, with the participants using various pieces as weapons.
